name: Vending machine from the future
description:
This is a very small VN I made with a sci-fi setting! I was reading some horror/scifi books and got inspired by them, and wanted to make a VN that was as small as possible so I could finish it.
Character art was commissioned to the super talented @tenne_luna, and music tracks are from the free archive of music (no longer available) from samfree who's always been one of my favourite music producers.

I hope you enjoy the read!

(NOTE: English is not my first language, so you will find typos and weird things)
